api_list.api_description: Returns price data of a single cryptocurrency.

required_parameters.name: coin_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the cryptocurrency to retrieve data for.

optional_parameters.name: quotes
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated list of quotes to return

api_list.api_description: Retrieve the market ticker information for a specified instrument.

required_parameters.name: inst_id
required_parameters.description: The instrument ID for which ticker information is required.

query: Can you provide me with the latest market price for Bitcoin and show its ticker from OKX?
